mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cooperative_trip_invites (trip_id, created_by, invite_type, token, short_code, share_link, expired_at, created_at) VALUES (#{tripId}, #{createdBy}, #{inviteType}, #{token}, #{shortCode}, #{shareLink}, #{expiredAt}, #{createdAt})
mapper.update: UPDATE cooperative_trip_invites SET token = #{token}, short_code = #{shortCode}, share_link = #{shareLink}, expired_at = #{expiredAt}, created_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM cooperative_trip_invites WHERE token = #{token} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM cooperative_trip_invites WHERE short_code = #{shortCode} ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 1
